name: Moto Cielo
description: Moto Cielo is located in the Heywood district of central Night City. Moto Cielo is a location in Heywood controlled by the Valentinos.[1] Many years prior to 2071, Valentino priest Sebastian Ibarra was caught in a bloodbath in Moto Cielo. After surviving, he found what he considered a noble calling, becoming a fixer of Night City.[2] "Moto Cielo" in Spanish can be translated into "Bike Heaven" in English. Despite making sense in English, in Spanish it would be more accurate to write it as...
